data.title: Intuit India
data.meta_description: Intuit India | 79,945 followers on LinkedIn. The global financial technology platform with TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp that powers prosperity. | The global financial technology platform that powers prosperity for the people and communities we serve with TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, and Mailchimp.
data.text:
NGN Intern Hackathon 2024, that’s a wrap! 🎉 About 40 summer interns came together to ideate, code, and present their ideas to solve real customer and business problems using Intuit’s GenOS capabilities. This event was the first of its kind for our talented young minds and helped foster a mindset of innovating with velocity and building a network with their peers, buddies, mentors, and leaders across different teams here at Intuit India. Three cheers to the Next Generation Network for always keeping things fresh, and to all the interns who took on the challenge! 🥳👏🌟

Today marked a special day at Intuit as we unveiled the second edition of The Book of Pride! 🌈✨ A brainchild of Intuit India’s Pride Network, this edition captures heartfelt curation of stories from Intuit employees in India and globally, candidly sharing their experiences at work and beyond, detailing their journeys within the LGBTQIA+ community and allyship. 🏳️🌈 From coming out to navigating the workplace as a queer person or ally, these stories open a world that may or may not be familiar to you. 📖 As you dive into these pages, think of it as an invitation—a chance to understand, celebrate, and stand up for the LGBTQ+ community. 🤝 This isn’t just a book but a slice of our hearts, wrapped with the belief that stories can bring lasting transformation. <3

Intuit India is back with yet another riveting chapter of the Women in Data Science (WiDS) Worldwide (WiDS) conference 2024, an event dedicated to empowering women and fostering innovation in the realm of data science! 🌟 This year, we were thrilled to host over 160 enthusiasts and participants at our office in Bangalore, where tech talks commenced, followed by paper presentations on cutting-edge research in the field of data science. 📊 This year’s theme for paper presentations was ‘AI for Content Generation and Personalisation’. 🤖 More about WiDS: Initiated by Stanford University, WiDS began as a one-day conference and has grown into a global data science movement. 🌐 It now features conferences, a datathon, podcasts, workshops, and programs for future data scientists, reaching over 100,000 professionals annually. 📈 Through this event, WiDS x Intuit India aim to bring diversity in hiring and foster a vibrant community of analytics, AI, and data science enthusiasts in Bangalore.🌍 We thank all those who joined us, participated, and partnered with us to make this conference a resounding success – here’s to the meteoric influence and recognition of women in the tech industry! 🚀💡👩💻 Arpita Patra Neela Sawant Damitri Kundu, Ph.D. Sravya Garapati Koyel Mukherjee Prashanth Seshadri Radhika Kannan Vignesh Subrahmaniam Anusha Mujumdar, PhD Sidharth Kumar Dhruti Karia AIM

At Intuit India, we're proud to foster a culture of inclusivity, equality, and authenticity. 🏳️🌈 Did you know? 1) We have a dedicated employee led Pride Network that works year round towards infusing inclusivity at the workplace 2) We have been recognised as a Gold Employer by the India Workplace Equality Index 2023 3) We have our very own curation of stories called The Book of Pride where employees share their LGBTQIA+ journeys 🏳️🌈 Secret Sauce: here’s how we're making a difference 1) Creating Awareness: Partnering with amazing organizations like Pride Circle and individuals committed to the cause 2) Walking the Talk: Embracing the LGBTQIA+ community right from the hiring practices 3) Creating a Safe, Inclusive Workplace: Offering meaningful benefits and policies that go the extra mile. A special shoutout to our Pride Circle for their incredible support and partnership! ❤️ 🙌 Watch the full episode of Queer(ious) in Corporate now! https://lnkd.in/gPK4T7dR Sumanta Ranjan Das Kusuma K Rohit Nair Sanjana Goel Taniya R. Ashwith Atluri Partha Pratik Mishra #pridemonth #lgbtqia+ #lgbt

Big wins and big data go hand in hand at Intuit India🏆. We are thrilled to add another feather to our cap with our recognition as the #1 Best Firm for Data Scientists to Work For 2024 by AIM, a leading publication in the realm of Machine Learning and Data Science! From analyzing trends to being the trailblazing trend-setters of the industry, we want to wholeheartedly thank all our data scientists and teams that made this feat possible and propelled us to new heights in the Big Tech world - take a bow! 👏 These are exciting times if you are a tinkerer, innovator and passionate about AI, and Intuit India is the place to be to ride the next wave of the tech revolution.🚀 How do we provide a foundation for an AI-native mindset and a culture of experimentation and innovation? ✅ Global Engineering Days where data scientists build on their passion projects ✅ Hosting the Women in Data Science (WiDS) Worldwide Conference that brings together a network of women data science researchers and professionals ✅ AI Adoption Accelerator program for all our employees to stay ahead of the curve ✅ Partnership with the premier institution, BITS Pilani to enable our innovators to pursue programs in Data Science and Machine Learning ✅ Developing our very own GenOS to unlock AI capabilities ✅ Presenting our leading work on applications of AI at international research conferences like CODS-COMAD Intuit #data #datascience #AI #tech #bigtech #innovation
